name: navigationUpdatedById
description: [BETA] Subscribe to navigation session system event updates. We strongly recommend using this at all times to not miss any updates

fields.name: route_id
fields.description: The current route used for navigation

fields.name: route_alternative_id
fields.description: The current route alternative used for navigation

fields.name: state
fields.description: The state of a navigation session. The status can be driving, charging, finished, or error

children.name: Driving
children.description: Vehicle is driving

children.name: Charging
children.description: Vehicle is charging

children.name: Finished
children.description: Navigation session is completed (either manually or automatically 48 hours after the last update)

children.name: Error
children.description: Failed to update navigation session due to route error or not found

fields.name: state_of_charge
fields.description: State of charge at the last known location

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: The coordinates array with longitude as first value and latitude as second one

children.name: station_id
children.description: The ID as string of the charging station

children.name: station_location
children.description: GPS location of the charging station

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: The coordinates array with longitude as first value and latitude as second one

children.name: via
children.description: An array with all GPS locations of via points until the next charging station

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: The coordinates array with longitude as first value and latitude as second one

children.name: estimated_state_of_charge
children.description: Estimated state of charge, in kWh, at arrival on the next charging station

children.name: estimated_consumption
children.description: Estimated consumption, in kWh, from last the known location until the next charging station

children.name: estimated_duration
children.description: Estimated duration, in seconds, from the last known location until the next charging station

fields.name: alternative_stations
fields.description: A set of alternative charging stations to next station

children.name: station_id
children.description: The ID as string of the charging station

children.name: station_location
children.description: GPS location of the charging station

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: The coordinates array with longitude as first value and latitude as second one

children.name: via
children.description: An array with all GPS locations of via points until the next charging station

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: The coordinates array with longitude as first value and latitude as second one

children.name: estimated_state_of_charge
children.description: Estimated state of charge, in kWh, at arrival on the next charging station

children.name: estimated_consumption
children.description: Estimated consumption, in kWh, from last the known location until the next charging station

children.name: estimated_duration
children.description: Estimated duration, in seconds, from the last known location until the next charging station

args.name: instructions_format
args.description: Turn by turn instructions format for a route

children.name: Chargetrip
children.description: Chargetrip raw instructions

children.name: MapboxV5
children.description: Mapbox instructions mapping

args.name: language
args.description: Preferred navigation instructions language. Default: en

children.name: en
children.description: English(US)

args.name: precision
args.description: Number of decimals used for the Google Polyline encoding Algorithm. Allowed values are 5 or 6, the default is 5
